snippet.title: Combat Racing Roguelike - Bloody Rally Show (Northernlion Tries)
snippet.description:
Bloody Rally Show on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/926860/Bloody_Rally_Show/

Bloody Rally Show is a totally new concept to me -- a (sometimes) combat racing game with procedurally generated tracks and light roguelike elements. Check it out!

If you enjoyed the video, please consider hitting the Like button. It helps me out a lot! 
-----------------------------------------------
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/Northernlion
Follow me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NorthernlionLP
-----------------------------------------------
About this game: 

A unique mashup of racing, car battle and roguelite brings you an infinite variety of race tracks and procedurally generated campaigns with dystopian story and AI generated conversations, missions and challenges.

Race fast cars with satisfying controls across infinite variety of randomly generated and handcrafted tracks.
Compete for glory against other people in Steam Leaderboards.
